Texts.Chs: 把^orange;酿酒工作台^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;booze kit^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你想酿造属于你自己的酒？很好！我会帮你的。首先，你必须制造一个^green;酿酒工作台^white;。当你制作完成，那么恭喜你！你已经是酿酒新手了！
Texts.Eng: So you want to make your own booze? Great! I'll help you. You must start by crafting a ^green;Booze Kit^white;. Place it against a wall and you can start your path to becoming a Brew Master!

Texts.Chs: 你的酿造启蒙之路已经开始了。在我们开始酿造工作之前，你必须先建造酿酒工作台，因为你会用到其他更多的东西。
Texts.Eng: Your path to brewing enlightment has started. Before we really start with the alcohol though, you must first use the Booze Kit to craft the other stations you'll require.
